scripts.publish-courier:dev: ENV=dev npm run prepare-publish && npm version ${VERSION:-patch} && FLAVOR=courier RELEASE_CHANNEL=dev npm run publish
scripts.publish-courier:staging: ENV=staging npm run prepare-publish && FLAVOR=courier RELEASE_CHANNEL=staging npm run publish
scripts.publish-courier:live: ENV=live npm run prepare-publish && FLAVOR=courier RELEASE_CHANNEL=live-v0 npm run publish
scripts.publish-consumer:dev: ENV=dev npm run prepare-publish && npm version ${VERSION:-patch} && FLAVOR=consumer RELEASE_CHANNEL=dev npm run publish
scripts.publish-consumer:staging: ENV=staging npm run prepare-publish && FLAVOR=consumer RELEASE_CHANNEL=staging npm run publish
scripts.publish-consumer:live: ENV=live npm run prepare-publish && FLAVOR=consumer RELEASE_CHANNEL=live-v0 npm run publish
scripts.build: npm run prepare-publish && npm run install-remote-types && eas build --no-wait --platform $PLATFORM --profile $FLAVOR-$ENV && npm run install-local-types
scripts.build-android-courier:dev: FLAVOR=courier ENV=dev PLATFORM=android npm run build-android
scripts.build-android-courier:staging: FLAVOR=courier ENV=staging PLATFORM=android npm run build-android
scripts.build-android-courier:live: FLAVOR=courier ENV=live PLATFORM=android npm run build-android
scripts.build-android-consumer:dev: FLAVOR=consumer ENV=dev PLATFORM=android npm run build-android
scripts.build-android-consumer:staging: FLAVOR=consumer ENV=staging PLATFORM=android npm run build-android
scripts.build-android-consumer:live: FLAVOR=consumer ENV=live PLATFORM=android npm run build-android
scripts.build-ios-courier:dev: FLAVOR=courier ENV=dev PLATFORM=ios npm run build-ios
scripts.build-ios-courier:staging: FLAVOR=courier ENV=staging PLATFORM=ios npm run build-ios
scripts.build-ios-courier:live: FLAVOR=courier ENV=live PLATFORM=ios npm run build-ios
scripts.build-ios-consumer:dev: FLAVOR=consumer ENV=dev PLATFORM=ios npm run build-ios
scripts.build-ios-consumer:staging: FLAVOR=consumer ENV=staging PLATFORM=ios npm run build-ios
scripts.build-ios-consumer:live: FLAVOR=consumer ENV=live PLATFORM=ios npm run build-ios
scripts.install-local-types: npm uninstall @appjusto/types && npm install ../types && git add . && git commit -m 'Updating @appjusto/types'
scripts.install-remote-types: npm uninstall @appjusto/types && npm install @appjusto/types && git add . && git commit -m 'Updating @appjusto/types'
scripts.clear-cache: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git fetch
